lead_paragraph: ZIRINSKY--Daniel. The family of Lawrence Zirinsky mourns the passing of our beloved cousin and partner. A man of many interests, including especially photography, he taught us so much over the years. He had a spirit of generosity and conciliation and a great loyalty to friends and family. He also had a great sense of humor. We will remember him always and miss him greatly. Olga, Ruth, Hanna, Leela Gracie, Jacob, Bill and John 1/3
